INKCAZELO:

Eli Sebe libonelela ngeenkonzo ezimbini zeemephu:
* IiMephu zeGIS Ngokwesicelo
* Ukuzenzela Ezakho iiMephu Usebenzisa Amaxwebhu Enkangeleko

IIMEPHU ZE-GIS NGOKWESICELO

Isebe linakho ukuhlanganisa iimephu ezibonisa izinto ezahlukeneyo zomhlaba kwakunye nezixhobo ngokusekelwe kwimimandla ye-GIS. Ezi mephu zivuleleke kuluntu ngokubanzi. Kufuneka unikezele ngezi nkcukacha zilandelayo xa ufaka isicelo semephu:
* ubukhulu bemephu (A0, A1, A2, A3, A4)
* iimpawu zecadastra (ierven, iifama, izitalato, ubukhoboka)
* iimpawu zendalo engqongileyo (iindawo ezibekelwe imisebenzi yabucala, imifuno, iCAPE Data)
* iimpawu zempilo (izibhedlele, iiklinikhi, izithili zezempilo, imimandla yezempilo)
* iimpawu zezibonelelo (iintambo zamanzi, iintambo zombane)
* iimpawu zemimandla (imida yezithili & neyoomaspala beedolophu, imida Yeengingqi zabantu abaqeshelwe ukubala abantu)
* iimpawu zoluntu (izikhululo zamapolisa, izikolo)
* iimpawu zeemephu (iicontour, iimpawu zendalo)
* iimpawu zothutho (iindlela, imizila kaloliwe)
* iimpawu zamanzi (amadama, imilambo, imizimba yamanzi)
* inani leekopi ezifunwayo
* iinkcukacha zoqhagamshelwano nedilesi emaziye kuyo
* usuku lokuvalwa oluseyingcebiso nje.


Izicelo zeemephu kufuneka zenziwe ngembalelwano (nge-email / ifeksi/ ileta) zithunyelwe kwiCandelo Iinkonzo zolwazi futhi neenkcukacha zoqhagamshelwano kufuneka zinikezelwe.

Iimephu zingahlawulelwa ngemali eziinkozo okanye ngetsheki. Iitsheki kufuneka zihlawulwe kwiSebe leMicimbi yeNdalo Engqongileyo & noPhuhliso loCwangciso.

Iimephu zinokulandwa kwigumbi 604D, 27 Wale Street, Cape Town okanye amalungiselelo okusiwa kwazo angenziwa.

Ezi rhafu zilandelayo zihlawuliswa kuphela iinkonzo zosasazo:
* ubukhulu bephepha A0 - R44 iphepha ngalinye
* ubukhulu bephepha A1 - R37 iphepha ngalinye
* ubukhulu bephepha A2 - R30 iphepha ngalinye
* ubukhulu bephepha A3 - R24 iphepha ngalinye
* ubukhulu bephepha A4 - R24 iphepha ngalinye


UKWENZA IIMEPHU KUSETYENZISWA AMAXWEBHU

Usenakho nokuhlanganisa eyakho imephu usebenzisa amaxwebhu enkangeleko asele ekho.

Uya kudinga iArcExplorer software (ae2Setup.exe - 13MB) ukujonga amaxwebhu enkangeleko ii-Egis. Izixhobo ezisimahla zinokufumaneka kwiwebsite ye ESRI.

Ukuncedisa ngemisebenzi ye-ArcExplorer, incwadana yemephu ehlanganiswe lisebe eli ebonisa ngendlela emayisetyenziswe ngayo imephu le iyafumaneka kwikhompyutha (162 KB - 4 amaphepha ama-4).

Amaxwebhu enkangeleko "zizinto ezisikiweyo" ze zabekwa kwiindawo zokugcina ze-.zip. Iba yingcebiso ke ukuba usebenzise iWinZip okanye enye indlela efanayo ukuze ukwazi ukufikelela kwiindawo zokufihla ezo.

ISIKHUSELO

Isebe eli alinakuthatyathwa njengelinoxanduva lwazo naziphi na iimpazamo ezinokuvuka kwiindibaniselwano zolwazi.

UKUSETYENZISWA KOLWAZI
Lonke ulwazi lunikezelwa ngaphandle kwamalungelo okulusasaza. Ulwazi olusasazwe leli Sebe alunakukotshwa, lusasazwe ngaphakathi okanye luthengiswe nangayiphi na indlela (ngokwerhafu iVAT okanye nanagayiphi na indlela) kuye nabani na/ kuwo nawaphi na amaqela angengawo awombutho/isebe lakho. Iikopi ezininzi zeembumba zolwazi zinokusasazwa ngaphakathi kuphela.
